tools.name: core
tools.description: Essential Clanker tools - file operations, process management, and more

tools.name: hello-world
tools.description: A simple example tool that demonstrates the basic structure of a Clanker tool

tools.name: write-to-file
tools.description: Write complete content to a file

tools.name: view-file
tools.description: View contents of a file or list directory contents

tools.name: update-todo-list
tools.description: Update existing todos in the todo list

tools.name: summarize
tools.description: Intelligently summarize text content into structured markdown

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for files containing a pattern using ripgrep

tools.name: remove
tools.description: Delete one or more files with confirmation

tools.name: read-file
tools.description: Read an entire file to prepare for editing

tools.name: pwd
tools.description: Get the current working directory path

tools.name: multi-edit
tools.description: Flexible file editing tool with order-invariant algorithm

tools.name: list
tools.description: List files and directories in a given path

tools.name: list-todos
tools.description: List all current todos in the todo list

tools.name: input
tools.description: Show a platform-specific input dialog to get information from the user

tools.name: create-todo-list
tools.description: Create a new todo list for planning and tracking tasks

tools.name: bash
tools.description: Execute bash commands with timeout and output capture
